mapper.select: SELECT id, req_no as reqNo, applicant_id as applicantId, work_order_no as workOrderNo, device_id as deviceId, req_status as reqStatus, is_urgent as isUrgent, approve_id as approveId, approve_time as approveTime, approve_remark as approveRemark, apply_time as applyTime, remark, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM biz_requisition WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT r.id, r.req_no as reqNo, r.applicant_id as applicantId, r.work_order_no as workOrderNo, r.device_id as deviceId, r.req_status as reqStatus, r.is_urgent as isUrgent, r.approve_id as approveId, r.approve_time as approveTime, r.approve_remark as approveRemark, r.apply_time as applyTime, r.remark, r.created_at as createdAt, r.updated_at as updatedAt, u.name as applicantName, a.name as approverName, e.name as deviceName, e.code as deviceCode FROM biz_requisition r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.applicant_id = u.id LEFT JOIN user a ON r.approve_id = a.id LEFT JOIN equipment e ON r.device_id = e.id WHERE r.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_requisition SET req_status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
